mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(social_service_type, social_service_unique_id, name, email) VALUE (#{socialServiceType}, #{socialServiceUniqueId}, #{name}, #{email})
mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.name, u.email, IF(count(uk.keyword), true, false) AS haveKeywords FROM user u LEFT JOIN user_keyword uk ON u.id = uk.user_id WHERE u.id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO user_bookmark(user_id, news_url) VALUE (#{userId}, #{newsUrl})
